Package jinngine.physics

Interface Summary
ContactTrigger.Callback  
DeactivationPolicy A utility used by Scene to classify inactive and active bodies.
Scene Main interface for using Jinngine.
Trigger Triggers are inserted into Scene to monitor events in animation
 

Class Summary
Body A body is a rigid body entity, that is animated according to the laws of Newton.
ContactTrigger The contact trigger monitors a specific body for contact interactions.
DefaultDeactivationPolicy Default implementation of a de-activation policy.
DefaultScene A basic fixed time stepping rigid body simulator.
State Physical state structure for a rigid body.
